full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 NE-238 2-57 (20) File No. : A10 294 862 DDP Date : November 18, 1957 CERTIFICATE OF IDENTITY To facilitate transportation to China via Hong Kong of applicant whose photograph appears below NAME: MAR DOO, aka MAR AU SANG DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH: K.S. 34-7-15 (1908) Lung Deng, Kwangtung,China NATIONALITY: CHINESE SEX: MALE OCCUPATION OR PROFESSION: LABORER MARITAL STATUS: married PRESENT ADDRESS: c/o Soon Hing Farm, Box 29A, Route #1 (Millstone Rd) Cranbury, New Jersey PURPOSE OF JOURNEY: For travel to Hong Kong in transit to China. A national passport or any form of travel document cannot be obtained for travel to China. PERSONAL DESCRIPTION Height: 5-6" Weight: 140 Color of hair: black Attach Photograph Color of eyes: brown Identification marks: mole over right eyebrow MURRAY BORISKIN, ACTING DISTRICT DIRECTOR For the U.S. Immigration & Naturalization Service
